Univera KM is What Your Body Needs:
Essential bitter herbs and minerals are critical for digestive health, but unfortunately they have been removed from conventional diets primarily due to their pungent taste. Univera KM provides these natural phytonutrients and recommended daily minerals, in particular potassium, iron, and iodine.


The Univera Difference:
Produced through a proprietary process, Univera KM is a natural phytonutrient-rich mineral formulation made from a synergistic combination of minerals and extracts of 14** unique botanicals to fill vital dietary gaps.

KM Kaps are also available in convenient capsules that dissolve quickly for maximum absorption.
